title: This guy plays tank ekko and his winning percentage with him is 52 percent RIOT?
body:
He is still broken this is ridiculous
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=youjealous87

replies.body: Just cause some dude plays tank ekko doesnt mean hes broken god damn dude, have you ever thought that it was his personal skill with the champion that makes him all in hen he has the strngth to or to back out when he doesnt
how tf is a 52% win rate broken?
Its not fair that he can build tanky and still do damage and have his ult plus a group stun

> [{quoted}](name=chiilinbreeze,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uVfAVp6h,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-17T03:41:35.491+0000)
>
> Its not fair that he can build tanky and still do damage and have his ult plus a group stun

Yeah and it isn't fair that Yasuo can dive you under tower with one item, life isn't fair.

So? i have a 70-75% winrate with ahri and have for four years.

One person does not a broken kit make.
